text.section: There is an Office of Cemetery Oversight in the Department.
The Office exercises its rights, powers, and duties subject to the authority of the Secretary.

section.section: The Secretary shall appoint an Advisory Council on Cemetery Operations.
The Advisory Council consists of 12 members.
The Advisory Council shall be convened at least four times a year to give advice to the Secretary and the Director.
In addition to the required meetings, the Advisory Council may meet as necessary.

text.section: The term of a member is 3 years.
